Name: Nature's Madness
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 1. Damage Roll is Half of the Target's remaining HP (up to 10 Dice) Rounded down. If the remaining HP of the Target is 1, this move fails. Ignore Defenses.
Description: The forces of nature attack as if they had a will of their own. Water will try to drown you, plants will trap you, lightning will come out of nowhere, even your own body will fail you.
